summary: Olsen and Johnson, a pair of stage comedians, try to turn their play into a movie and bring together a young couple in love, while breaking the fourth wall every step of the way.
cast: Ole Olsen|Chic Johnson|Martha Raye|Hugh Herbert|Jane Frazee|Robert Paige|Mischa Auer|Richard Lane|Lewis Howard|Clarence Kolb|Nella Walker|Shemp Howard|Elisha Cook Jr.|Frank Darien|Catherine Johnson|Gus Schilling|The Six Hits|Slim Gaillard|Slam Stewart|Ann Johnson|Frankie Manning|Olive Hatch|Eddie Acuff|Kathryn Adams|Sig Arno|Frank Austin|Marvin Bailey|Don Brodie|George Chandler|Milton Charleston|Dean Collins|Billy Curtis|George Davis|Hal K. Hinds|Howard Hudson|George Humbert|Frances 'Mickey' Jones|Ethelreda Leopold|Jack 'Tiny' Lipson|Leota Lorraine|Jimmie Lucas|Mack McLean|Norma Miller|Susan Miller|Al Minns|Harry Monty|Lyle Moraine|Joseph North|Gil Perkins|Jean Porter|Jerry Preshaw|Dorothy Raye|Billy Ricker|Willa Mae Ricker|Bert Roach|Bob Rose|Angelo Rossitto|Fred Sanborn|Bill Seckler|Rex Stewart|Andrew Tombes|Dale Van Sickel|Ellinor Vanderveer|Terry Walker|Billy Wayne|Arthur White's Lindy Hoppers and Jitterbugs|Dave Willock
title: Loquilandia
